          <title>
            <string language="en">Cracking and breaking of rocks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Knacken und Brechen der Felsen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fendre et se casser des roches</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rachar e quebrar das rochas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spezzandosi e rompersi delle roccie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ράγισμα και σπάσιμο των βράχων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El quebrarse y el romperse de rocas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how rocks break into pieces when water freezes in between rock cracks.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crack</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">expansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">freezing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rock</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Felsen in Stücke 
brechen, wenn Wasser zwischen Felsensprüngen einfriert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment les roches se 
cassent en morceaux quand l'eau gèle entre des fissures de roche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como as rochas quebram 
em partes quando a água se congela dentro entre rachaduras da rocha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come le roccie si 
rompono nelle parti quando l'acqua congela fra le crepe della roccia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς οι βράχοι σπάζουν 
στα κομμάτια όταν παγώνει το ύδωρ μεταξύ των ρωγμών βράχου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo las rocas se 
rompen en pedazos cuando el agua congela entre las grietas de la roca.</string>
          </description>
